segments.text: Hi , Mel , would you like to come and have a cup of coffee this afternoon ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ d love to , but you know I ’ Ve got another appointment . I ’ m really sorry .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . Then what about tomorrow , at Starbucks ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m afraid not , George . You gotta know something , I ’ m not available any more . but I know Becky has a crush on ya .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you kidding me ? Becky ? She ’ s a real bitch .
segments.speaker: S1
